pages.text: The $(5)Camouflage Module$() can be used in a $(l:mffs:machines/projector)Force Field Projector$() to alter the appearance of the force field itself. With a $(5)Camouflage Module$() installed, force fields may be disguised as regular blocks. For example, a force field might be masked as a wall of Stone. The $(5)Camouflage Module$() can be used in combination with all Projector Modes.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: This feature of the Projector can help players to hide things from other people or camouflage the entrance to a secret base. Select a block you wish to use as camouflage and place it in another empty slot of the Projector's left-hand item matrix (the same matrix as the $(5)Camouflage Module$()). Activate the Projector in the usual way.

pages.text: A Pyramid force field camouflaged as Stripped Oak Wood.
